Source code for lib.cards.deck

import random

from lib.cards import constants as CARD
from lib.cards.card import Card


[docs]class Deck(object):
	def __init__(self):
		deck = []
		for suit in CARD.SUITS:
			for num in CARD.VALUES:
				card = Card(suit, num)
				deck.append(card)
		for joker in CARD.JOKERS:
			deck.append(Card(joker, joker))
		self.cards = deck


[docs]	def shuffle(self):
		random.shuffle(self.cards)



[docs]	def sort(self):
		self.cards.sort()



[docs]	def pop(self):
		return self.cards.pop()
